definition: to cross/to go over/to pass (time)/to celebrate (a holiday)/to live/to get along/excessively/too-
to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent

sentences.english: Thermal protector in motor will interrupt current when motor overheats .
sentences.chinese: 電機過熱時，熱保護器將會中斷電流。

sentences.english: Curing property of the adhesive was studied by thermal analysis.
sentences.chinese: 通過熱分析，研究了該發泡膠的固化特性。

sentences.english: It is hoped and expected that the tighter policy environment will also dampen the excessively high rates of investment.
sentences.chinese: 市場希望透過緊縮政策將能有效調節過熱的投資氣氛。

sentences.english: An overheated economy can only exacerbate an incipient deterioration in inflationary expectations.
sentences.chinese: 經濟過熱只會使初顯惡化態勢的通脹預期進一步惡化。

sentences.english: Food with a lot of fat should be watched carefully - cooking to for too long can lead to burning.
sentences.chinese: 不宜長時間烹煮油脂重的食物，以免油脂過熱發煙。

sentences.english: As China overheats , inflation is picking up.
sentences.chinese: 隨着中國經濟的過熱，通脹開始擡頭。

sentences.english: B Overtemperature device for cabinets or for panel mounted equipment.
sentences.chinese: 櫃裝或盤裝設備的過熱裝置。

sentences.english: Only turn the water heater on when necessary, and adjust temperature controls to avoid overheating.
sentences.chinese: 熱水器不用就別開，控制溫度不要過熱。

sentences.english: The heat from the exposed core soon turns the steam into superheated steam.
sentences.chinese: 暴露的堆芯所發出的熱量，瞬間將蒸汽變成過熱蒸汽。

sentences.english: In other words, if you look for signs of overheating, they are there.
sentences.chinese: 換句話說，如果你在尋找過熱的跡象，它們就是。

sentences.english: The helicopter is supplied with a tank gun 2A42, which is never overheated.
sentences.chinese: 這種直升機配有2A42坦克炮，彈膛永遠不會過熱。

sentences.english: It's better to ensure that your CPU never overheats .
sentences.chinese: 最好的辦法還是保證你的CPU永遠不會過熱。

sentences.english: The calculation of adiabatic flash was simplified with a heat analysis.
sentences.chinese: 通過熱分析簡化了絕熱閃蒸的算法。

sentences.english: The wires in circuits are kept from heating by either fuses or circuit breakers.
sentences.chinese: 保險絲或斷電器可以保護電路中的電線不致過熱。

sentences.english: And I know that at macro level, there are some concerns about the overheating.
sentences.chinese: 我知道在宏觀層面，對於經濟過熱有一些擔憂。

sentences.english: Overheated food either the drink, will scald or puncture the olive inside the mouth directly to drill thrust out.
sentences.chinese: 過熱的食品或飲料，會直接燙傷或刺橄口內鑽腆。

definition: to become hot/temperature rise/(fig.) to intensify/to hot up/to escalate/to get a boost
(economics) to reduce/to curtail/to cut back/to tighten/austerity/tightening/crunch
to intensify/to sharpen/to accelerate/to aggravate/to exacerbate/to embitter
